descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://img37.imageshack.us/img37/9328/belrand.png[/img][/center]

[center][b]Hello again.[/b]
I have pleasure to represent you new look for the ugliest companion in Skyrim. Belrand. I dont wanted to make him handsome, ive just wanted to make him more acceptable for me. So hire it is. New, younger Belrand. He now have heterochromia. 

[i]Sorry for my english.[/i]

[/center]

[b]My other mod\'s:[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9809]Calder Better Look[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9807]Vampiric Marcurio[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10000]Vampiric Calder[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10085]Vilkas Beter Look[/url]


[b]Recommended mod\'s[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2356]Xenius Character Enhancement[/url]

[b]Credits:[/b]
To creator of NPC Editor, i hope it will be more option soon, to make Skyrim companions much more better.
author: Gnatozuj
